item.title: 如何使用日志框架.md
item.description: 如何选择日志框架并解决冲突 logback配置文件 https://mp.weixin.qq.com/s?__biz=MzUzMTA2NTU2Ng==&mid=2247507916&idx=3&sn=99226aa132805fcac3dec83f0d494acb&chksm=fa4aa07dcd3d296b70402e2dcc9ab5a6136df8eafdcc758b4223d9e4433d1bd022f228a2bcab&mpshare=1&scene=1&srcid=0205CqK4JI2wmmpCogocXv4r&sharer_sharetime=1612493462792&sharer_shareid=cbc82124cedc2b0864b983af90cce39a#rd 配置日志链路 traceId MDC
